descriptionHtml:
Increases magicka regenration rate while in combat. The default rate is 33%. Download includes ESPs for: 50%, 66%, 75%, and 100%. I don\'t think there\'s anything more to say.

---

Install:

Put the ESP(s) in your Skyrim data folder, activate the one you want. Only activate one at a time.

files.name: Faster Combat Magicka Regeneration - All options
files.fileName: Faster Combat Magicka Regeneration - All options-4541-1-0.rar
